TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
What kind of soup is a water soup? Those aren't on our menu here.

Waiter, there's a gun in my soup! Can I keep it?

Oops, wrong guy. *walks away muttering "CIA, we've been discovered. I gave the delivery to the wrong guy, abort the assassination."

Waiter, there's a counting down timer in my soup, it reads 12 seconds at the moment... 11... 10...

Well never mind the numbers mason.

Waiter, there is a frigate in my soup.

No, that's just an ant. The restaurant is made of ants.

Waiter! There's a government in my soup! It's firing missiles at me.

Your best bet is to try and make peace, but there's no guarantee they'll listen.

WAAAAAIIIIIITER I still haven't gotten my soup!

Well, did you order any?

Waiter, there's a restaurant in my soup!

Did your restaurant's chef cut up the rivaling restaurants and hide the evidence in the soup?

If it's edible then why are you complaining?

Waiter, there's oil in my soup.

Sorry, BP's been at it again! *chuckle*

Waiter! There's a Slipspace drive in my soup.

Oh, the aliens must have mixed it up.

Waiter, there's a rocket launcher in my soup!

Too late, that rocket launcher is aimed at you.

Waiter there's a possessed butter knife in my soup!

That's for buttering your bread. You did order bread right?

Waiter my soup is trying to eat me!

Thats because its inverted soup so it eats you!

Waiter! There is just a tomato in my tomato soup!

Because it's tomato soup!

Waiter! There's soup in my soup!

Terribly sorry sir, I'll get you a new bowl of soupless soup.

Waiteeeeer! There's no bowl for my soup!

The bowl is edible and made of soup.

Waiter! There's a wild cougar in my soup!

Well, if you aren't liking her maybe you could pass her on to me?

Waiter! There's a Facehugger in my soup!

It only wants a hug.

Waiter! My soup tastes like soup!

Everything is fine. Now please follow the kind lady in the bright yellow hazmat suit, will you?

Waiter, there's a jet engine causing waves in my soup!

Sell it, I suppose. A jet engine that can work while submerged in soup is undoubtedly pretty advanced.

Waiter, I'm in my soup.

Then, don't pour it all over yourself next time!

Waiter, -999999ERROR

Mr. Sun, please follow to the Avast download page.

Waiter, there is a Jupiter in my soup!

What a deal! You not only get soup but you also get a whole planet!

Waiter, there's garlic in my soup and I'm allergic!

I'm so sorry....... OH MY KOD!!!!

Kill it! Kill it with stakes! Then kill it with fire!

Waiter why is my dog licking my soup

The dog's owner ordered that soup... Wait a sec... RECEPTIONIST! Get this guest checked in!

Waiter, there is a pig in my soup!

Yes... Quick! Turn him into bacon!

Wait, what's thi- ... Waiter! There's blue crystal meth on my soup! I think you got the wrong kind of cook!
